parameter.name: code
parameter.documentation: The code that is to be validated.

parameter.name: version
parameter.documentation: The version of the code system.

parameter.name: display
parameter.documentation: The display associated with the code, if provided.

parameter.name: abstract
parameter.documentation: If true, an abstract code is allowed to be used.

parameter.name: lenient-display-validation
parameter.documentation: If true, the server will return a warning instead of an error if the display is not correct.

parameter.name: result
parameter.documentation: True if the concept details supplied are valid.

parameter.name: message
parameter.documentation: Error details for an invalid code.

parameter.name: display
parameter.documentation: A valid display for the concept.

parameter.name: system
parameter.documentation: The system for the code that was validated.

parameter.name: codeSystem.content
parameter.documentation: The content mode of the CodeSystem resource.
